term.title: Mohr amplification process

item.text: The process in which iodide is oxidized to iodate to achieve a more favourable measurement.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 2553. 'Recommendations on use of the term amplification reactions' on page 2555 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254122553)
